body: `= NULL` seems to be a valid thing to do in C as well https://www.tutorialspoint.com/cprogramming/c_pointers.htm and I also verified it in the code by not setting the destructor locally and it seems to be fine but perhaps I am missing something obvious.
body_html: = NULL seems to be a valid thing to do in C as well https://www.tutorialspoint.com/cprogramming/c_pointers.htm and I also verified it in the code by not setting the destructor locally and it seems to be fine but perhaps I am missing something obvious.
